calculations.name: Change Sec MV USD
calculations.tableau_expression: [Sec MV USD T] - [Sec MV USD T -1]

calculation_context.Expression: [Sec MV USD T] - [Sec MV USD T -1]

calculated_fields.Sec MV USD T -1:
if [Parameters].[Use Custom Date] then 
    (if [MAX_DATE -1day]= [RpDate] then ABS([Sec value USD])/10^6 else 0 END)
else if [Comparison date] = [RpDate] then ABS([Sec value USD])/10^6 else 0 END END
calculated_fields.Sec MV USD T:
if [Parameters].[Use Custom Date] then 
    (if [Max Date]= [RpDate] THEN ABS([Sec value USD])/10^6 else 0 END)
else if [RpDate]= [Parameters].[End Date] then ABS([Sec value USD])/10^6 else 0 END END
calculated_fields.MAX_DATE -1day:
case datepart('weekday',[Max Date])
when 1 then [Max Date]-2
when 2 then [Max Date]-3
else [Max Date]-1
end
calculated_fields.Comparison date: if [Parameters].[Use Custom Date] THEN [MAX_DATE -1day] ELSE  [Parameters].[Date X (comparison date)] END
calculated_fields.Max Date:
case datepart('weekday',today())
    when 1 then today()-2
    when 2 then today()-3
    else today()-1
    END
